chat_history.description: Incorporate external chat history, specifically previous messages within the conversation. Please note that System Message will be ignored and will not have any effect when this field is populated. Each message should adhere to the format: : {"role": "The message role, i.e. 'system', 'user' or 'assistant'", "content": "message content"}.
chat_history.instillShortDescription: Incorporate external chat history, specifically previous messages within the conversation. Please note that System Message will be ignored and will not have any effect when this field is populated. Each message should adhere to the format: : {"role": "The message role, i.e. 'system', 'user' or 'assistant'", "content": "message content"}.
chat_history.title: Chat history

max_new_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens for model to generate
max_new_tokens.title: Max new tokens

model_id.description: ID of the Instill Model model to be used.
model_id.title: Model ID

model_namespace.description: Namespace of the Instill Model model to be used.
model_namespace.title: Model Namespace

system_message.description: The system message helps set the behavior of the assistant. For example, you can modify the personality of the assistant or provide specific instructions about how it should behave throughout the conversation. By default, the modelâ€™s behavior is using a generic message as "You are a helpful assistant."
